mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT review_com_no, user_no, review_no , review_com_content, review_com_date, review_com_like, review_com_hate FROM ZREVIEW_COMMENT WHERE review_no = #{reviewNo } ORDER BY review_com_hate ) ORDER BY review_com_no
